name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei  2nd solo live ＂Shout in Crisis＂ [USmUfG_-Sn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Interlude with visual effects, audience cheering, and title reveal 'SHOUT in CRISIS'.
Transition interlude with a cappella vocals and instrumental intro for the next song.

subtitles.original: もっと叫びたくなってしまえばいいのになんて思うんだ
subtitles.english: I find myself thinking it would be fine if I just felt like screaming more

subtitles.original: そこに立つ私に
subtitles.english: To me, standing there

subtitles.original: あー あー
subtitles.english: Ah- ah-

subtitles.original: 不自由だとかもろもろ順調なんだよ
subtitles.english: Things like lack of freedom and everything else are going well

subtitles.original: せめてくだらない理由で地を這うような明日じゃないなら
subtitles.english: As long as it's not a tomorrow where I'm crawling on the ground for some trivial reason

subtitles.original: ちょっと黙ろうか 満ちもいけるよ 悠々
subtitles.english: Shall we be quiet for a bit? I can go through the high tide with ease

subtitles.original: そこでもっと叫ぶんだ
subtitles.english: So I'll scream more there

subtitles.original: 燃え尽くして
subtitles.english: Burn it all out

subtitles.original: 灼熱に転じて
subtitles.english: Turning into a red heat

subtitles.original: だって僕は星だから
subtitles.english: Because I am a star

subtitles.original: きっと君はもう気づいていた
subtitles.english: I'm sure you had already noticed

subtitles.original: 僕の心の奥で書いた
subtitles.english: What I wrote deep within my heart

subtitles.original: それがこれから話すチープなモノローグさ
subtitles.english: That is the cheap monologue I'm about to tell you

subtitles.original: ずっと言えない言葉があった
subtitles.english: There were words I could never say

subtitles.original: 凍えそうな風が吹いた
subtitles.english: A freezing wind blew

subtitles.original: ずっとさ
subtitles.english: Forever

subtitles.original: ふっと香りだすその匂いか
subtitles.english: Is it that scent that suddenly wafts out?

subtitles.original: どうしようもなく切なくて
subtitles.english: It's so hopelessly heart-wrenching

subtitles.original: 部屋の隅で膝を抱えて震えていた
subtitles.english: I was shivering in the corner of the room, clutching my knees

subtitles.original: 太陽なんていらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need something like the sun

subtitles.original: 明けないでいて
subtitles.english: Please don't let the day break

subtitles.original: その手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand

subtitles.original: 誰かに届くように
subtitles.english: So that it might reach someone
